akn:content.akn:p: In addition to the general qualifications for licensure set forth in subchapter V of this chapter, and any requirements which the Mayor may establish by rule, a dietitian shall:
Licensure to practice dietetics pursuant to this chapter shall also entitle the licensee to use the title of nutritionist.
In addition to the general qualifications for licensure set forth in subchapter V of this chapter, and any requirements which the Mayor may establish by rule, a nutritionist shall:

The Mayor, by rule, shall establish requirements for the completion of a planned, continuous, preprofessional program of supervised experience as a condition for licensure as a dietitian or nutritionist.

The Mayor shall, within 12 months of March 25, 1986, develop, and update as necessary, an examination to assess an applicantâ€™s knowledge and understanding of the principles of nutrition and ability to apply the principles effectively and for the benefit of patients or clients in the practice of nutrition.
